course_description: Integrated Marketing Communications (IMC) involves the strategic process of planning, developing executing, evaluating and controlling the use of various promotional mix elements to effectively communicate with target audiences. The goal of most of this communication is to encourage customers to become aware of a brand, develop a preference for it, and eventually purchase it.  The goals of this course are: 1) to help you gain an understanding the communications mix and its role in the development and implementation of strategic brand strategy; 2) to help you gain firsthand skills in developing an integrated marketing communications campaign for an organization, including market and customer analysis, determining objectives, creative strategy and media planning, budgeting, campaign design and analysis.
